title: Translate None to zeros for old-style autograd functions
body_html:
Fixes #4198. This changes None elements of grad_input tuples to zeros in "old-style" autograd functions, to match "new-style" autograd function behavior.

I reused a function that changes grad_outputs to zeroes if any of them are None. I'm not sure if this function has other side effects that should only apply to grad_outputs only but it doesn't look like it does.

Test Plan

New unit test in test_autograd

body:
Fixes #4198. This changes None elements of grad_input tuples to zeros in "old-style" autograd functions, to match "new-style" autograd function behavior.

I reused a function that changes grad_outputs to zeroes if any of them are None. I'm not sure if this function has other side effects that should only apply to grad_outputs only but it doesn't look like it does.

### Test Plan
New unit test in test_autograd
